actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 44, United States Code, to reduce the paperwork burden on citizens by requiring Federal agency correspondence to include the name, official title, telephone number, and address of individuals to whom responses and inquiries may be made.

summary.text: Federal Government Easy Access Act - Requires Federal agency correspondence outside the executive branch to include the name, phone number, and mailing address of individuals to whom responses and inquiries may be made.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 35 of title 44, United States Code, to reduce the paperwork burden on citizens by requiring Federal agency correspondence to include the name, official title, telephone number, and address of individuals to whom responses and inquiries may be made.
